0.text: Innate- Shard of the Monolith: Malphite gains increased percentage size equal to 8% of his total armor, capped at 35% increased size at 437.5 armor.

1.text: Innate: Malphite  shields himself for 9% of his maximum health. The shield lasts until it is broken, and refreshes after a few seconds of not taking damage.

0.text: Active: Malphite sends a shard to the target enemy that deals magic damage and  slows them for 3 seconds.

1.text: Malphite also gains  bonus movement speed equal to the raw amount the target lost from the slow for the duration.

0.text: Passive: Malphite gains  bonus armor, tripled while  Granite Shield is active.

1.text: Active: Malphite's next basic attack within 6 seconds is empowered to gain  50 bonus range and deal  bonus physical damage  on-hit.

2.text: Additionally, Malphite's basic attacks  on-hit for the next 5 seconds trigger a cone in the direction of the target that deals physical damage to enemies hit.

3.text: Thunderclap  resets Malphite's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Malphite slams the ground beneath him, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  crippling them for 3 seconds.
Active: Malphite  dashes with  displacement immunity to the target location. Upon arrival, he deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  knocks them up for 1.5 seconds.

1.text: Unstoppable Force will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

Keywords

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • yellow
  • totem
  • trinket

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).
Corrupting Potion can be used even at full health and mana.
passive.originText: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.

1.originHTML: +  350

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+450 health
+25 armor
+25 magic resistance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within 325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.
Unique – Snowbind: Basic attacks create a 250 radius frost field around the target that lasts for 1.5 seconds and deals ( 12 − 85 / 6 − 42.5) (based on level) magic damage to all enemies inside initially and slows all enemies within by ( 25% / 12.5%) (+ ( 4% / 2%) per 1000 maximum health) for 1.5 seconds (( 4 / 6) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 100 bonus health and 6% increased size.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IMMOLATE: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within  325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.

Keywords

  • chilly mittens

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+15 ability haste
+350 health
+500 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants bonus health equal to 8% maximum mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Consumes a charge on-hit and whenever affecting an enemy or ally with an ability to grant 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 for champion targets, up to a maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Fimbulwinter at +360 mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – AWE: Grants bonus health equal to 8% maximum mana.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  1100

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+350 health
+60 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Thorns: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THORNS: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.  Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

active.originText: UNIQUE – HUMILITY: Unleash a shockwave around you that  slows nearby enemies by 99% for 0.25 seconds and reduces their attack damage by 10% and critical strike damage by 20% for 4 seconds (60 second cooldown).

Passive

Unique – Rock Solid: Every incoming instance of post-mitigation basic damage is reduced by 5 (+ 3.5 per 1000 maximum health), maximum 40% reduction each.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ROCK SOLID: Every incoming instance of post-mitigation  basic damage is reduced by 5 (+ 3.5 per 1000 maximum health), maximum 40% reduction each.

Keywords

  • fh

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+350 health
+70 magic resistance
+5% movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Absorb: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
Unique – Dissipate: While at 6 stacks of Steadfast, gain 10% bonus movement speed and reduce all incoming magic damage by 25%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ABSORB: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming  immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.

Active: Malphite's next basic attack within 6 seconds is empowered to gain  50 bonus range and deal  bonus physical damage  on-hit.
